Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to enhancing enforcement of the prohibition against drivers of for-hire vehicles accepting passengers without telephone contract or prearrangement.
Items.MatterName: Enhancing enforcement of the prohibition against drivers of for-hire vehicles accepting passengers without telephone contract or prearrangement.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing on-demand ground vehicle transportation in areas underserved by taxicabs by establishing stands where licensed for-hire vehicles may accept passengers without prearrangement.
Items.MatterName: Providing on-demand ground vehicle transportation in areas underserved by taxicabs.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the creation of an advisory board of drivers.
Items.MatterName: Creation of an advisory board of drivers.

Items.Title: A Local La to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to defective trouble lights.

Resolution urging the Metropolitan Transportation Authority-New York City Transit (MTA-NYCT) to delay a final fare hike vote until updated financial data is available that would justify such a fare increase.
Items.MatterName: MTA-NYCT to delay a final fare hike vote until updated financial data is available.
